damage_resistances.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the merregon's {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The merregon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The merregon makes three Halberd attacks.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Loyal Bodyguard
entries: When another Fiend within 5 feet of the merregon is hit by an attack roll, the merregon causes itself to be hit instead.
